short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For completed pull requests displays sprint in which pull request was completed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sometimes it is useful to see what ADO release was your PR part of. This extensions adds such information just next to the date when the PR was merged.
